response.original_title: 怪談新耳袋 御祓いは効かない編
response.overview: The directors include Toshiaki Hirano, the chief director of the TBS drama "Say Hello to Black Jack," Hirohisa Sasaki of "Screaming Lips," Ryuta Miyake of Fuji TV's "Scary True Stories," and Keisuke Toyoshima of "Ghost vs. Alien," gathering the young talents of horror films. The cast features Maki Horikita, Mai Kitajima, and Kei Horie, among others.
response.title: Kaidan Shin Mimibukuro: Oharai wa Kikanai-hen

titles.title: 怪谈新耳袋 消灾求福也没用篇
